body.name: Just My Size Women's Plus-Size Short Sleeve V-Neck Tee

byLineInfo.name: Visit the JUST MY SIZE Store

features: SLIMMING SILHOUETTE - A 29" length and contoured shirttail hem produce a flattering, slimming fit in these tee shirts for women.
V-NECK - These comfortable shirts feature a lightly-ribbed, wide overlapping V-neckline.
SIZE UP - Size up for a roomier fit.
ITCH FREE - Tagless construction equals itch-free comfort.
COTTON GOODNESS - Crafted from 100 percent ring-spun cotton. (Light steel is 90% cotton, 10% polyester.)
COLD WATER WASH - Machine wash in cold water. Tumble dry low. Cool iron if needed.
body.description: Classic yet so much more – JMS Women’s V-Neck T-shirt is your go-to when you want the softness and comfort of plus size shirts designed to flatter your figure. Crafted from soft, ring-spun cotton, its 29” length forms a flattering, slimming silhouette while a shirttail hem adds a sporty touch. You’ll love the feminine look of a lightly-ribbed, wide overlapping V-neckline. Pair these t-shirts for women with your favorite jeans, leggings, shorts, or joggers. It’s a look that works every time. Wear as a standout top layer when warm weather comes calling or under a jacket or cardigan when it's time to chill.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice tees; order TWO sizes larger, they run very small!
reviews.reviewText: These tees are surprisingly nice for the price. They aren't the most high end, nor are they low end either. The material is soft, adequate thickness (light enough for summer but not see through) and stitched properly. The only thing to be aware of is the sizing. Based on the reviews, I ordered these tees TWO sizes larger than I normally would order. They are 100% cotton and will shrink one size after you wash and dry them. Add to that, they run an extra size smaller to begin with. Hence the two sizes larger. Since I hate tight fitting tee shirts, the larger size fit me just right after washing. They are a bit long for me since I am short, but I'm accustomed to that. I originally bought one to try it out. I was quite satisfied with my first purchase, so I ordered 3 more in different colors. Again, great basic tee shirts for the price. I ordered purple, aqua, black & grey (not in stock right now.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars no shrinkage after wash and 100% cotton, comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Reviews were all over about these tops. I still have a couple jms tees that must be 15 years old but are soon to be turned into rags. I wanted a casual tee that is all cotton with sleeves that are not too tight or too short. I have blended tees that fit through the body but the sleeves make my arms look like sausage stuffed into a small casing and they tend to sink into creases. I am 5'3", 230 lbs, bust measures 47", waist 46 1/2", hips 51". I have broad shoulders and chubby arms. The circumference of the top of my arm measures 16 1/2" and length from top of shoulder to elbow bend is7 1/2". I normally wear a 3x or 2x sometimes. The 2 pictures on the left are the 4x I ordered after reading they run small. It was bigger than I would like and seemed like a true 4x. I washed it in cold water and dried on normal, hoping it would shrink a littles as some had complained they did. It did not shrink at all. I took a chance and ordered 3 in a 3x. hoping the sizing would be accurate. These fit the way I like and those are the 2 pics on the right. The sleeves are not too short or tight., the armholes fit normally and comfortably and the v neck is not too low for me. The cotton is soft. Some complained it is scratchy but mine are not at all. The length goes to the top of my thighs in front and bottom of my butt in back and the scoop hem is very slight as is the cut through the sides. The material does not stick in creases yet is not real thick. They should be comfortable in hot weather. I washed the 3 x's in cold water and dried on delicate just to be sure they didn't shrink. There was no shrinkage on these either. They all fit the same. I had gotten 2 more in the blue and 1 grey. The stitching and seams are good and the v neckline still laid flat after washing. The pictures posted are after the shirts were washed. You do need to get them out of the dryer right away or I am sure they will wrinkle a lot. Considering some of the reviews, I don't know if I just got lucky or if the mfg. has made quality changes but I am very happy with the shirts I got and they are true to my normal size. I wanted a casual shirt for around the house in 100% cotton, running errands or a casual restaurant and these fit the bill for my needs. Some say these fit boxy and I suppose you could say they do since the side dip is not as much as many womens shirts are made but I don't want shirts that pull tight across my belly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great shirt for the price
reviews.reviewText: It seems like it is very difficult to find shirts that cover my butt these days. Many of the shirts in stores are on the short side for my tastes. This shirt fits well and is flattering but it is still a little short. After a few washes (even with hang drying them) the shirts have shrunk and now when I raise my arms my stomach will show. It is a great shirt but I wish they were made longer so that it covers my stomach fully.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice soft material. Upper half of the shirt fits well, but it's super short. I'm 5'7 and it barely went past my navel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great basic shirt
reviews.reviewText: I have several of these that I have purchased over the past year or so, they are a great basic cotton shirt at a good price. They have held up well and are a go-to for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy Pj top
reviews.reviewText: I use this for pajamas since it is soft, loose and comfortable. I'm not sure why we are rating "sheerness", I wouldn't want it to be sheer and it isn't.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered one in each color and they fit perfectly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not long enough
reviews.reviewText: Shirt fits well , very soft but sad to say to short. Fat girls need two more inches of length to cover the tummy bulge.
I like that the size ordered fits perfect!
True to size, lovely fabric and colour is awesome! Has stretch in material but don’t need it. It fits loosely not snug. Love it!!
Great price. True to size. Washes well. I have purchased 3 different colors. Happy with purchase
